title: Microsoft Open Sources OpenVMM Rust-Powered VM Monitor
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: Following Microsoft's recent release of OpenHCL, a confidential virtual machine paravisor, the company has now released OpenVMM, a VMM written in Rust.
cntitle: 微软开源 OpenVMM，一款基于 Rust 的虚拟机监控器
cndescription: 继微软最近发布了 OpenHCL（一种机密虚拟机旁虚拟化程序）之后，该公司现在又发布了 OpenVMM，这是一个用 Rust 编写的 VMM。
